# sqlr.pregnancy

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`sqlr.pregnancy` is an R package with the compendium files of the project: "Expression of the sleep-wake cycle throughout pregnancy: a systematic literature review".

Learn more about Systematic Quantitative Literature Reviews (SQLR) at http://bit.ly/2OMxvcD .

## Installation

You can install `sqlr.pregnancy` from from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("sqlr.pregnancy")
devtools::install_github("gipsousp/sqlr.pregnancy", dependencies = TRUE)
```

## Citation

If you use `sqlr.pregnancy` in your research, please consider citing it. You can find the `sqlr.pregnancy` citation below.

```{r}
citation("sqlr.pregnancy")
```
